arts.sum: El ex delantero del Inter ingresó en el tramo final del partido. Estuvo participativo, pero tuvo poco tiempo para ser determinante

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 0-0 Udinese: Match Report
arts.sum: Hellas Verona secured a hard-fought goalless draw against Udinese in a tense Serie A encounter, despite playing with 10 men in the closing stages. The home side's goalkeeper emerged as the hero of the match with a series of crucial saves that preserved the point for his team. arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona v Udinese: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Hellas Verona will be without Martin Frese, along with long-term absentees Juan Cruz and Abdou Harroui, as they prepare for their upcoming match against Udinese. However, captain Darko Lazovic is set to return after being substituted during last week's victory over Bologna. The post Serie A | Verona v Udinese: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: OFFICIAL: Udinese complete Oumar Solet signing
arts.sum: Udinese have officially finalised the acquisition of defender Oumar Solet, with the club depositing his contract and receiving the necessary transfer documents. The 24-year-old French center-back joins the Friulian side on a free transfer after mutually terminating his contract with Red Bull Salzburg. The post OFFICIAL: Udinese complete Oumar Solet signing appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Udinese eyeing Lazio’s Castrovilli as midfield reinforcement
arts.sum: Udinese are reportedly considering a move for Lazio midfielder Gaetano Castrovilli as they look to bolster their squad for the second half of the Serie A season. The former Fiorentina player has struggled to find regular playing time under Lazio manager Marco Baroni, making just one start in the league campaign so far. The post Udinese eyeing Lazio’s Castrovilli as midfield reinforcement appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Udinese director Gianluca Nani: “We are not considering offers for Lorenzo Lucca”
arts.sum: Gianluca Nani, the transfer market specialist for both Udinese and Watford, recently shared his thoughts on the past year and the upcoming transfer window. In an interview with TMW, Nani provided insights into the performance of both clubs and their plans for the future. The post Udinese director Gianluca Nani: “We are not considering offers for Lorenzo Lucca” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona v Udinese: Match Preview
arts.sum: As Serie A action resumes in the new year, Hellas Verona welcome Udinese to the Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi on Saturday evening in a match with implications at both ends of the table. The hosts will be looking to build on their recent victory and further distance themselves from the relegation zone, while Udinese aims to solidify their position in the top half of the standings.
